title: Colombia-India trade Ties: 65 Years of Strategic Growth and Expanding Opportunities
description:
Over 65 years, strong economic and commercial ties have been built between South American nation Colombia and India. This is evidenced by the growth in bilateral trade, highlighting that Colombian non-mining exports have increased by 80 percent from 2022 to 2023.

title: Colombia's Fiscal Projection Falls Below Target
description:
Colombia's independent fiscal rule committee announced a revised projection for the country's fiscal deficit, estimating it will reach 6.2% of gross domestic product by 2025.

This updated figure marks a significant decrease from a former projection of 6.7% made earlier this month.

It also falls be...

title: Colombia's Revised Fiscal Path: Deficit Projection Lowered
description:
The Colombian fiscal landscape saw a positive shift as the independent fiscal rule committee revised the 2025 fiscal deficit projection to 6.2% of GDP, down from a previous target of 7.1%. This adjustment also falls below the earlier projection of 6.7% set at the beginning of the month.

title: Colombia central bank nudges 2024 inflation outlook up to 5.5%
description: BOGOTA: The technical team of Colombia's central bank slightly raised its inflation forecast for this year to 5.5% from a previous 5.4%, it said in a quarterly report published on Friday.The forecast is below the South American country's inflation rate of 7.36% for the 12 months through March but re...
